scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c cyan,magenta 'yarn client dev' 'yarn server start:dev' --kill-others
scripts.build: yarn client build && yarn server build
scripts.lint:check: yarn client lint:check && yarn server lint:check
scripts.lint:fix: yarn client lint:fix && yarn server lint:fix
scripts.prettier:check: yarn client prettier:check && yarn server prettier:check
scripts.prettier:fix: yarn client prettier:fix && yarn server prettier:fix
scripts.codecheck: yarn client codecheck && yarn server codecheck
scripts.codecheck:fix: yarn client codecheck:fix && yarn server codecheck:fix
scripts.tsc:check: yarn client tsc:check && yarn server tsc:check
